H0.text: In which country could you drive along the 1700 kilometre Bruce Highway. Australia

H1.text: In which country could you drive along the 1700 kilometre Bruce Highway. Canada

H2.text: In which country could you drive along the 1700 kilometre Bruce Highway. United States

H3.text: In which country could you drive along the 1700 kilometre Bruce Highway. Straya

A4.text: The Bruce Highway is a major highway in Queensland, Australia.

A5.text: It passes through areas close to the eastern coast on its way to Cairns in Far North Queensland.
